General.Name: Trend Innovations Holding Inc
General.Description: Trend Innovations Holding Inc. develops, acquires, creates, and innovates artificial intelligence (AI) technologies. The company publishes Thy News application for processing news from various sources. It also provides information technology (IT) consulting services, including project management and software administration, financial and asset management, service management, and event management. The company was formerly known as FreeCook and changed its name to Trend Innovations Holding Inc. in July 2019. Trend Innovations Holding Inc. was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Vilnius, Lithuania.
